align-content.Description: Aligns items in a flex container along flex lines.

all.Description: Resets all element properties to its default or inherited values.

animation-delay.Description: Sets a delay before an animation begins.

animation-direction.Description: Sets how, in which direction, an animation is played.

animation-duration.Description: Defines the duration of an animation cycle.

animation-fill-mode.Description: Defines how styles are applied before and after animation.

animation-iteration-count.Description: Sets the number of times an animation is played.

animation-name.Description: Defines a name for the animation.

animation-play-state.Description: Sets the animation play state to running or paused.

backface-visibility.Description: Shows or hides the backface visibility of an element.

background.Description: Sets the background of an element.

background-attachment.Description: Defines how the background is attached to an element.

background-blend-mode.Description: Defines the background layer blending mode.

background-clip.Description: Defines how background extends beyond the element.

background-color.Description: Sets the background color of the element.

background-image.Description: Specifies a background image for an element.

background-origin.Description: Specifies the background image origin position.

background-position.Description: Sets the position of a background image.

background-repeat.Description: Specifies how the background image is repeated.

background-size.Description: Sets the size of the background image.

border.Description: Specifies a border for an element

border-bottom.Description: Specifies a bottom border for an element.

border-bottom-color.Description: Sets the color of a bottom border .

border-bottom-left-radius.Description: Sets the border radius of the bottom left corner.

border-bottom-right-radius.Description: Sets the border radius of the bottom right corner

border-bottom-style.Description: Sets the style of the bottom border.

border-bottom-width.Description: Sets the width of the bottom border

border-collapse.Description: Sets table borders to single collapsed line or separated.

border-color.Description: Sets the color of the border.

border-image.Description: Defines an image as border, instead of a color.

border-image-outset.Description: Sets how far a border image extends beyond the border.

border-image-repeat.Description: Defines if and how the border image is repeated.

border-image-slice.Description: Defines how the border image will be sliced.

border-image-source.Description: Specifies the url of the border image file.

border-image-width.Description: Sets the width of the image border.

border-left.Description: Sets the left border of the element.

border-left-color.Description: Sets the color of the left border.

border-left-style.Description: Sets the style of the left border.

border-left-width.Description: Sets the width of the left border.

border-radius.Description: Sets the radius of the border.

border-right.Description: Sets the right border of the element.

border-right-color.Description: Sets the color of the right border.

border-right-style.Description: Sets the style of the right border.

border-right-width.Description: Sets the width of the right border.

border-spacing.Description: Sets the adjacent table cell distance.

border-style.Description: Defines the style of the border

border-top.Description: Sets the top border of the element.

border-top-color.Description: Sets the color of the top border.

border-top-left-radius.Description: Sets the border radius of the top left corner.

border-top-right-radius.Description: Sets the border radius of the top right corner.

border-top-style.Description: Sets the style of the top border.

border-top-width.Description: Sets the width of the top border.

border-width.Description: Sets the border width of the element.

bottom.Description: Positions the element from the bottom of the relative container.

box-shadow.Description: Adds a shadow effect to an element.

box-sizing.Description: Sets how element height and width are calculated.

caption-side.Description: Defines on which side of the table a caption is placed.

caret-color.Description: Sets the color of the blinking mouse caret.

@charset.Description: Specifies the character encoding of the stylesheet.

clear.Description: Sets the element side that does not allow floating elements.

clip.Description: Sets how an image is cropped or clipped inside a container.

clip-path.Description: Clips an element inside a specific shape or SVG.

color.Description: Specifies the color of text in an element.

column-count.Description: Divides an element into the specified number of columns.

column-fill.Description: Specifies how divided columns are filled.

column-gap.Description: Specifies the space between divided columns.

row-gap.Description: Specifies the space between divided rows.

column-rule.Description: Sets the style, width, and color of a column divider.

column-rule-color.Description: Sets the color of a column divider.

column-rule-style.Description: Sets the style of a column divider.

column-rule-width.Description: Sets the width of a column divider.

column-span.Description: Sets number of divided columns an element should span.

column-width.Description: Specifies the width of a divided column.

columns.Description: Divide an element into columns of a certain width.

content.Description: Used to insert content before or after an element.

counter-increment.Description: Increase or decrease a CSS counter.

cursor.Description: Specifies the shape of the mouse cursor.

direction.Description: Specifies the text writing direction of a block-level element.

display.Description:
Block elements start on a new line and take up the full available width.

Grid lets you place child elements within rows and columns.

Flex lays out it's child elements on a horizontal or vertical axis.

Inline is the default for text content. Font size and line height determine it's size.

Inline-block behaves like inline, but accepts width and height properties.

None hides the element.

empty-cells.Description: Specifies whether empty table cell borders will be displayed.

filter.Description: Adds an image enhancing effect to an image.

flex.Description: Specifies the width of the flexible items.

flex-basis.Description: Specifies the initial width of a flex item.

flex-direction.Description: Specifies the direction for the flex item to align.

flex-flow.Description: Controls the direction and wrapping of flexible items.

flex-grow.Description: Specifies how a flex item can grow inside the container.

flex-shrink.Description: Specifies how a flex item can shrink inside the container.

flex-wrap.Description: Specifies how flexible items wrap inside the container.

float.Description: Sets how an element is positioned relative to other elements.

font.Description: Sets font family, variant, weight, height, and size for an element.

@font-face.Description: Embeds a custom font inside a web page

font-family.Description: Sets the font family for an element.

font-kerning.Description: Sets the spacing between the font's characters.

font-size.Description: Sets the size of the font for an element.

font-stretch.Description: Sets the text characters to a wider or narrower variant.

font-style.Description: Set the font style to normal, italic, or oblique.

font-variant.Description: Specifies that text is displayed in a small-caps font.

font-weight.Description: Sets the weight or thickness of the font.

grid.Description: Defines a grid layout with responsive rows and columns.

grid-area.Description: Sets the size and location of grid items in a grid container.

grid-auto-columns.Description: Specifies the size of the columns in a grid container.

grid-auto-flow.Description: Specifies the initial placement of items in a grid container.

grid-auto-rows.Description: Specifies the initial size of the items in a grid container.

grid-column.Description: Specifies the size and location of a grid item in a grid container.

grid-column-end.Description: Specifies how many columns an item will span.

grid-column-start.Description: Specifies the column in which the grid item should start.

grid-gap.Description: Specifies the gap size between grid rows and columns.

grid-row.Description: Specifies the grid item size and location in a grid container.

grid-row-end.Description: Specifies how many rows an item will span.

grid-row-gap.Description: Specifies the gap size between rows in a grid container.

grid-row-start.Description: Specifies the row in which the grid item should start.

grid-template.Description: Divides a page into sections with a size, position, and layer.

grid-template-areas.Description: Specifies area in a grid container.

grid-template-columns.Description: Sets the number of columns in a grid container.

grid-template-rows.Description: Sets the number of rows in a grid container.

height.Description: Sets the height of an element.

hyphens.Description: Specifies hyphenation with wrap opportunities in a line of text.

@import.Description: Imports a style sheet inside another style sheet.

justify-content.Description: Defines the alignment of items in a flex container.

@keyframes.Description: Defines the CSS style to animate.

left.Description: Positions the element from the left of the relative container.

line-height.Description: Sets the vertical spacing between lines of text.

list-style.Description: Defines the markers (bullet points) for items in a list.

list-style-image.Description: Defines an image markers (bullet points) for items in a list.

list-style-position.Description: Sets the marker (bullet point) positions for items in a list

list-style-type.Description: Defines the marker types (bullet points) for items in a list

margin.Description: Sets the margin (outside spacing) for an element.

margin-bottom.Description: Sets the bottom margin (outside spacing) for an element.

margin-left.Description: Sets the left margin (outside spacing) for an element.

margin-right.Description: Sets the right margin (outside spacing) for an element.

margin-top.Description: Sets the top margin (outside spacing) for an element.

max-height.Description: Sets the maximumn height for an element.

max-width.Description: Sets the maximum width for an element.

@media.Description: Applies media queries to a page.

min-height.Description: Sets the minimum height for an element.

min-width.Description: Sets the minimum width for an element.

object-fit.Description: Specifies how an image or video fits inside a container.

object-position.Description: Specifies the image or video position inside a container.

opacity.Description: Sets the opacity (transparency) of the element.

order.Description: Specifies the order of an item in a flex container.

outline.Description: Adds an outline (highlighted border) to an element.

outline-color.Description: Sets the color of an outline.

outline-offset.Description: Sets the space between the outline and border.

outline-style.Description: Sets the style of an outline.

outline-width.Description: Sets the width of an outline.

overflow.Description: Specifies the flow of content that exceeds the container.

overflow-x.Description: Specifies the flow of content that exceeds the container width.

overflow-y.Description: Specifies the flow of content that exceeds the container height.

padding.Description: Sets the spacing between content and element border.

padding-bottom.Description: Sets the spacing between content and bottom element border.

padding-left.Description: Sets the spacing between content and left element border.

padding-right.Description: Sets the spacing between content and right element border.

padding-top.Description: Sets the spacing between content and top element border.

page-break-after.Description: Adds a print page-break after an element.

page-break-before.Description: Adds a print page-break before an element.

page-break-inside.Description: Specifies if print page-break is allowed inside an element.

perspective-origin.Description: Sets the origin of the perspective for a 3D-positioned element.

pointer-events.Description: Specifies whether element reacts to pointer events or not.

quotes.Description: Defines the quotation marks to be used on text.

right.Description: Positions the element from the right of the relative container.

scroll-behavior.Description: Specifies the scrolling behavior of an element

table-layout.Description: Aligns elements according to a table with rows and columns.

text-align.Description: Sets the alignment of text inside an element.

text-align-last.Description: Sets the alignment for the last line of text.

text-decoration.Description: Defines the style and color of underlined text.

text-decoration-color.Description: Defines the color of underlined text.

text-decoration-line.Description: Defines the kind of line to use with text.

text-decoration-style.Description: Defines the style of underlined text.

text-indent.Description: Sets the indentation to the beginning of text.

text-justify.Description: Defines the text justification inside a container.

text-overflow.Description: Sets the display behavior of text that overflows a container.

text-shadow.Description: Adds a shadow effect to text.

top.Description: Positions the element from the top of the relative container

transform1.Description: Applies a 2D or 3D transformation to an element.

transform-origin.Description: Sets the origin for the transformation of the element.

transform-style.Description: Specifies the display behavior of 3D space nested elements.

transition.Description: Creates transitions from one property value to another.

transition-delay.Description: Creates a delay before the transition effect starts.

transition-duration.Description: Specifies the time the transition will take.

transition-property.Description: Specifies the CSS property that will transition.

transition-timing-function.Description: Defines the speed curve function of the transition.

user-select.Description: Specifies how text can be selected (highlighted)

vertical-align.Description: Specifies vertical alignment of an element.

visibility.Description: Specifies the visibility of an element.

white-space.Description: Specifies how white-space is handled inside an element.

width.Description: Sets the width of an element.

word-break.Description: Specifies how line breaks take place.

word-wrap.Description: Specifies how long words can be wrapped.

writing-mode.Description: Sets the text reading orientation: top to bottom, etc.

z-index.Description: Overlapping elements with a larger z-index cover those with a smaller one.

mix-blend-mode.Description: The mix-blend-mode property specifies how an element's content should blend with its direct parent background.
